text:
[Hanuman and the monkey army attack the Rakshasas. Hanuman challenges Indrajith for a duel and Lakshman catches the sight of Indrajith who gets up from the fire sacrifice to retaliate.]

अथतस्यामवस्थायांलक्ष्मणंरावणानुजः ।

परेषामहितंवाक्यमर्थसाधकमब्रवीत् ।।6.86.1।।
meaning: अथ and then, रावणानुजः Ravana's brother, तस्याम् them, लक्ष्मणं Lakshmana अवस्थायाम् tendered, परेषाम् for enemies, अहितम् not good, अर्थसाधकम् to accomplish the task, वाक्यम् words, अब्रवीत् spoke
translation: Ravana's brother seeing Lakshmana spoke these words of advice to accomplish the task and which is not good for the enemies.

meaning: मेघश्यामम् dark as cloud, यत् that which, एतत् all that, राक्षसानीकम् army of Rakshasas, विलोक्यते be engaged, एतत् all this, पादपायुधैः trees as weapons, कपिभिः monkeys too, शीघ्रम् swiftly, अयोध्यताम् will get engaged
translation: "The army of Rakshasas looks like a dark cloud and let the monkeys too get engaged to fight swiftly with trees as weapons."

meaning: लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, महतः mighty, अस्यअनीकस्य army of Rakshasas, भेदने shatter, यत that which, अत्र there, भिन्ने broken, राक्षसेन्द्रसुतोऽपि the son of Rakshasa king, दृश्यःभविष्यति will become visible
translation: "O Lakshmana! Shatter this mighty army of Rakshasas. When it is broken Ravana's son will become visible."

meaning: सः he, त्वम् by you, इन्द्राशनिप्रख्यैः like Indra's thunderbolt, शरैः arrows, परान् at enemy, अवकिरन् use, एतत् by that, कर्म action, यावत् all, न समाप्यते not completed, आशु quickly, अभिद्रववै not attack
translation: "You have come to attack the enemy. Before he completes his action quickly attack him with the thunderbolt of Indra."

meaning: वीर heroic, दुरात्मानम् of wicked mind, मायापरम् conjurer, अधार्मिकम् unrighteous, क्रूरकर्माणम् of cruel deeds, सर्वलोकभयावहम् terror for all the worlds, रावणइम् Ravana's son, जहि destroy
translation: "Hero, wicked minded, conjurer, unrighteous and cruel one who is a terror for all worlds is Ravana's son. Destroy him."

meaning: शुभलक्षणः auspicious, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, विभीषणवचः Vibheeshana's words, श्रुत्वा on hearing, राक्षसेन्द्रसुतं Rakshasa king's son प्रति in turn, शरवर्षाणि rain of arrows, ववर्ष rained
translation: Lakshmana, who had auspicious marks, on hearing Vibheeshana rained showers of arrows on Ravana's son.

meaning: द्रुमद्रिनखयोधिन: trees, mountains, nails,, ऋक्षाः Bears, शाखामृगाश्चैव monkeys too, सहिताः together, अवस्थितम् drawn, तत् अनीकम् that army, अभ्यधावन्त initiated
translation: The Bears and monkeys together initiated a fight with the army with trees, mountains, and nails as weapons.

meaning: राक्षसाः च Rakshasas also, समरे in battle, कपिसैन्यजिघांसवः to kill monkey army, शितैः sharp, बाणैः shafts, असिभिः swords, शक्तितोमरैः javelins and lances, उद्यतै: launched, अभ्यवर्तन्त attacked
translation: The Rakshasas also launched attacks in the battle with sharp swords, javelins, and lances.

meaning: कपिरक्षसाम् monkeys and Rakshasas, महता mighty, शब्देन sounds, लङ्काम् Lanka, समन्ततः all over, नादयन्वै resounded, सः that, तुमुलः intense, सम्प्रहारः mutual striking, सञ्जज्ञे equipped with
translation: With both the monkeys and Rakshasas mutually striking intensely, the mighty sounds resounded all over Lanka

meaning: विविधाकारैः various shapes, शस्त्रः weapons, शितैः sharp, बाणैश्च arrows also, पादपैः trees, उद्यतैः thrown, घोरैः dreadful, गिरिशृङ्गैश्च mountain peaks, आकाशम् sky, आवृतम् covered
translation: The sky was covered with weapons of various shapes, arrows, trees, mountain peaks thrown at each other and were dreadful.

meaning: विकृताननबाहवः misshapen faces and arms, तेराक्षसाः those Rakshasas, वानरेषु at monkeys, शस्त्राणि weapons, निवेशयन्तः pierced in their bodies, ते in them, सुमहत् great, भयम् fear, चक्रुः created
translation: The Rakshasas with disfigured faces and arms, attacked the Vanaras, and their bodies pierced with weapons created great fear in them.

meaning: तथैव by that, वानराश्च Vanaras, सकलैः all, वृक्षैः trees, गिरिशृङ्गैः mountain peaks, समरे in the battle, राक्षसर्षभान् bulls among Rakshasas, अभिजघ्नुः wounded, निजघ्नुः च and assailed
translation: The monkeys likewise wounded and assailed the bulls among Rakshasas with trees and mountain peaks in the battle.

meaning: महाकायैः of huge body, महाबलैः mighty, ऋक्षवानरमुख्यैः Bears and Vanara leaders, युध्यमानानाम् fighting in war, रक्षसाम् Rakshasas, महत् great, भयम् fear, अजायत caused
translation: Mighty Bears and Vanaras of huge body, fighting in the battle caused great fear in Rakshasas.

meaning: दुर्धर्षः one who is difficult to overpower, सः he, शत्रुभिः enemies, अर्धितम् crying in vain, स्वम् own, अनीकम् army, विषण्णम् agony, श्रुत्वा hearing, कर्मणि action, अननुष्ठिते not completed, उदतिष्ठत got up
translation: Indrajith, who is difficult to overpower, on hearing the cries of his own army in agony got up without completing the task (of ritual).

meaning: जातक्रोधः enraged, सः he, रावणिः Indrajith, वृक्षान्धकारात् darkness of trees, निर्गम्य coming out, पूर्वयुक्तम् already yoked, सुसंयुतम् firmly fixed, सज्जम् ready, रथम् chariot, आरुरोह ascended
translation: Enraged, Indrajith coming out of the darkness of trees ascended the chariot already yoked and fixed firmly.

meaning: भीमकार्मुकशरः armed with terrific bow and arrows, कालमेघसमप्रभ: body shining like a rainy cloud, रक्तास्यनयनः with red eyes, कृद्ध: angry, सः he, अन्तकः like spirit of death, मृत्युरिव like death, बभौ seemed
translation: Indrajith, armed with a terrific bow and arrows, his body shining like a rainy cloud, with red eyes, angry face, seemed like the spirit of death.

meaning: रथस्थम् from the chariot, तम् him, दृष्टवैव seeing, लक्ष्मणेन Lakshmana, युयुत्सताम् prepared for war, भीमवेगानाम् endowed with terrific speed, रक्षसाम् Rakshasas, तत् बलम् his army, पर्यवर्तत surrounded
translation: Seeing Lakshmana prepared for war, the Rakshasa army endowed with speed surrounded him.

meaning: तस्मिन् काले in the meantime, धरणीधरसङ्काशः who resembled mountain, अरिन्दमः tamer of enemies, हनुमान् Hanuman, सुदुरासदम् difficult to overpower, महावृक्षम् huge tree, उद्यम्य taking up, राक्षसानाम् at Rakshasas, तत् those, सैन्यम् army, कालाग्निरिव like fire at dissolution, निर्दहन् created havoc, सःhe, वानरःVanara, युधि in combat, बहुभिः many, वृक्षैः trees, निःसज्ञम् fighting, चकार went about
translation: In the meantime, Hanuman, who resembled a mountain, a tamer of enemies, who is difficult to overpower, taking up huge trees fighting with Rakshasas created havoc like fire at the time of dissolution and went about.

meaning: तस्मिन् काले in the meantime, धरणीधरसङ्काशः who resembled mountain, अरिन्दमः tamer of enemies, हनुमान् Hanuman, सुदुरासदम् difficult to overpower, महावृक्षम् huge tree, उद्यम्य taking up, राक्षसानाम् at Rakshasas, तत् those, सैन्यम् army, कालाग्निरिव like fire at dissolution, निर्दहन् created havoc, सःhe, वानरःVanara, युधि in combat, बहुभिः many, वृक्षैः trees, निःसज्ञम् fighting, चकार went about
translation: In the meantime, Hanuman, who resembled a mountain, a tamer of enemies, who is difficult to overpower, taking up huge trees fighting with Rakshasas created havoc like fire at the time of dissolution and went about.

meaning: राक्षसानाम् at Rakshasas, सहस्राणि thousands, तरसा at great speed, विध्वंसयन्तम् destroying, पवनात्मजम् WindGod's son, दृष्टवैव seeing, अवाकिरन् surrounded
translation: Seeing the wind god's son destroying, thousands of Rakshasas got together surrounding him.

meaning: शितशूलधराः holding sharp trident, शूलैः trident, असिपाणयः swords in hand, असिभिः च swords, शक्तिहस्ताः javelins in hand, शक्तीभिः च javelins, पट्टिशायुधाः armed with spears, पट्टिशैः spears, शुभदर्शनैः bright looking, कुन्तै: च glowing, शतशः iron bars, शतघ्नीभिः like fire, आयसैः iron, मुद्गरैरपि axes also, घोरैः dreadful, परशुभिश्चैव hammers, भिदनिपालैश्च Bhindi Palas, वज्रकल्पैः like thunderbolt, मुष्टिभिः fists, अशनिसन्निभैः like lightning, तलैः descended, पर्वतोपमम् like mountain, समन्तात् all over, समासाद्य collected, अभिजघ्नुः skilful, सङ्ग्रुद्धः furious, तेषाम् them, महत् huge, कदनम् war, चकार took place
translation: Between the skilful Rakshasas armed with sharp tridents, swords, javelins in hand, with spears in hand, bright iron bars glowing like fire, with iron axes, dreadful hammers, Bhindi palas and Hanuman, with thunderbolt like fists that descended like lightning, and slaps which descended like mountains, a huge skillful war took place.

meaning: शितशूलधराः holding sharp trident, शूलैः trident, असिपाणयः swords in hand, असिभिः च swords, शक्तिहस्ताः javelins in hand, शक्तीभिः च javelins, पट्टिशायुधाः armed with spears, पट्टिशैः spears, शुभदर्शनैः bright looking, कुन्तै: च glowing, शतशः iron bars, शतघ्नीभिः like fire, आयसैः iron, मुद्गरैरपि axes also, घोरैः dreadful, परशुभिश्चैव hammers, भिदनिपालैश्च Bhindi Palas, वज्रकल्पैः like thunderbolt, मुष्टिभिः fists, अशनिसन्निभैः like lightning, तलैः descended, पर्वतोपमम् like mountain, समन्तात् all over, समासाद्य collected, अभिजघ्नुः skilful, सङ्ग्रुद्धः furious, तेषाम् them, महत् huge, कदनम् war, चकार took place
translation: Between the skilful Rakshasas armed with sharp tridents, swords, javelins in hand, with spears in hand, bright iron bars glowing like fire, with iron axes, dreadful hammers, Bhindi palas and Hanuman, with thunderbolt like fists that descended like lightning, and slaps which descended like mountains, a huge skillful war took place.

meaning: शितशूलधराः holding sharp trident, शूलैः trident, असिपाणयः swords in hand, असिभिः च swords, शक्तिहस्ताः javelins in hand, शक्तीभिः च javelins, पट्टिशायुधाः armed with spears, पट्टिशैः spears, शुभदर्शनैः bright looking, कुन्तै: च glowing, शतशः iron bars, शतघ्नीभिः like fire, आयसैः iron, मुद्गरैरपि axes also, घोरैः dreadful, परशुभिश्चैव hammers, भिदनिपालैश्च Bhindi Palas, वज्रकल्पैः like thunderbolt, मुष्टिभिः fists, अशनिसन्निभैः like lightning, तलैः descended, पर्वतोपमम् like mountain, समन्तात् all over, समासाद्य collected, अभिजघ्नुः skilful, सङ्ग्रुद्धः furious, तेषाम् them, महत् huge, कदनम् war, चकार took place
translation: Between the skilful Rakshasas armed with sharp tridents, swords, javelins in hand, with spears in hand, bright iron bars glowing like fire, with iron axes, dreadful hammers, Bhindi palas and Hanuman, with thunderbolt like fists that descended like lightning, and slaps which descended like mountains, a huge skillful war took place.

meaning: शितशूलधराः holding sharp trident, शूलैः trident, असिपाणयः swords in hand, असिभिः च swords, शक्तिहस्ताः javelins in hand, शक्तीभिः च javelins, पट्टिशायुधाः armed with spears, पट्टिशैः spears, शुभदर्शनैः bright looking, कुन्तै: च glowing, शतशः iron bars, शतघ्नीभिः like fire, आयसैः iron, मुद्गरैरपि axes also, घोरैः dreadful, परशुभिश्चैव hammers, भिदनिपालैश्च Bhindi Palas, वज्रकल्पैः like thunderbolt, मुष्टिभिः fists, अशनिसन्निभैः like lightning, तलैः descended, पर्वतोपमम् like mountain, समन्तात् all over, समासाद्य collected, अभिजघ्नुः skilful, सङ्ग्रुद्धः furious, तेषाम् them, महत् huge, कदनम् war, चकार took place
translation: Between the skilful Rakshasas armed with sharp tridents, swords, javelins in hand, with spears in hand, bright iron bars glowing like fire, with iron axes, dreadful hammers, Bhindi palas and Hanuman, with thunderbolt like fists that descended like lightning, and slaps which descended like mountains, a huge skillful war took place.

meaning: सःइन्द्रजित् that Indrajith, कपिश्रेष्ठम् foremost of monkeys, अचलोपमम् like mountain, असन्त्रस्तम् without weapon, अमित्रान् enemies, सूदमानम् fearless, पवनात्मजम् Hanuman, ददर्श witnessed
translation: Indrajith witnessed Hanuman, the foremost of Vanaras without weapons, fearlessly fighting.

meaning: सः he, सारथिम् charioteer, इदम् thus, उवाचspoke, एषःin that way, वानरःVanara, यत्र there, याहि if not, उपेक्षितःkeep waiting, नः not, राक्षसानाम् Rakshasas, क्षयम् reduced, कुर्यादेवहि no doubt destroy
translation: Thus Indrajith spoke to the charioteer "This Vanara will no doubt reduce the Rakshasa army if we keep waiting."

meaning: तेन therefore, इति this way, उक्तः spoke, सारथिः charioteer, रथे chariot, स्थितम् seated, परमदुर्धर्षम् highly difficult to encounter, इन्द्रजितम् Indrajith, वहन् to that place, मारुतिःMaruthi, यत्र there, ययौ went
translation: On hearing Indrajith who is highly difficult to encounter speaking in that way his charioteer drove Indrajith, to that place, where Maruthi was.

meaning: दुर्धर्षःdreadful, सःराक्षसः that Rakshasa, अभ्युपेत्य going near, कपिमूर्थनि face of monkey, शरान् arrows, खङ्गान् swords, पट्टसासिपरश्वधान् iron bars, spears, अभ्यवर्षत rained
translation: Going near Hanuman, that dreadful Rakshasa, rained arrows, spears, swords and iron bars on the face of Hanuman.

meaning: सःमारुतिः he, Maruthi, घोराणि frightening, तानिशस्त्राणि those weapons, प्रतिगृह्य receiving, महता great, रोषेण rage, आविष्टः overcome by, इदंवाक्यम् this words, उवाच spoke
translation: Receiving those frightening weapons, Maruthi spoke these words overcome by anger.

meaning: दुर्मते evil minded, रावणात्मज Indrajith, शूरः warrior, असियदि such, युध्यस्व fight, वायुपुत्रम् son of WindGod, समासाद्य having met, जीवन् life, न प्रतियास्यसि not return alive
translation: "Evil minded hero! Fight with me back having met, you shall not return alive."

meaning: दुर्बुद्धे cruel, मे with me, द्वन्द्वम् duel, यदि if you like, बाहुभ्याम् arms, सम्प्रयुध्यस्व in duel war, आहवे come, वेगम् quickly, सहस्व with stand, ततः then, त्वम् you, रक्षसाम् among Rakshasas, वरःforemost
translation: "Fight with me for a duel war if you like. Come quickly and with stand, then you will become foremost among Rakshasas.

meaning: विभीषणः Vibheeshana, समुद्यतशरासनम् having seated, रावणात्मजम् Indrajith, हनूमन्तम् Hanuman, जिघांसन्तम् is ready to attack, लक्ष्मणाय Lakshmana, आचष्टे told
translation: "Vibheeshana told Lakshmana that Indarjith having seated is ready to attack Hanuman."

meaning: वासवनिर्जेता conqueror of Indra, सः he, यः that, रावणस्यआत्मसम्भवः Ravana's son, सःएषः in that way, रथम् chariot, आस्थाय reaching, हनूमन्तम् at Hanuman, जिघांसति seeks to kill
translation: "Ravana's son, the conqueror of Indra, having taken a se at in the chariot seeks to kill Hanuman."

meaning: सौमित्रे Saumithri, अप्रतिमसंस्थानैः of incomparable craftsmanship, शत्रुनिवारणैः formidable weapons, जीवितान्तकरैः capable of killing enemies, घोरैः dreadful, शरैः arrows, तम् them, रावणिम् Ravana's son, जहि kill him
translation: "O Saumithri! Kill that son of Ravana with your formidable weapons of incomparable craftsmanship, dreadful arrows capable of killing enemies."
